Key Match Events: Croatia came back from a 1-0 deficit to win 2-1
Ivan Perisic and Igor Matanovic combined for Croatia's first goal
Andre Kramaric scored the equalizing goal for Croatia in the 70th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Luka Modric's impactful performance throughout the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Croatia have six points from their first three games in the group and are set to face Poland in their next game on 15th October
Others: Modric captained the side and won all three of his tackles, made six recoveries and intercepted the ball six times
Scotland brought on Che Adams, who created a lot of danger in the final 13 minutes of the game but couldn't find the goal
The game almost had a dramatic end to it with Scotland having the ball in the back of the net with the last kick of the game, only for it to be called back for offside
